casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Alexander C. POLKE. No. 412A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 11, 2006. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, William Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of April 2006 by Defendant to Amend the Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of April 2006."
